snippet.title: Light Odyssey - Official Gameplay Reveal Trailer | Future of Play 2024
snippet.description: Light Odyssey is a Boss-Rush action game inspired by Shadow of the Colossus, the Dark Souls series, and Titan Souls. Set in a civilization robbed of its light by the Colossi, players embark on a journey to save the world. And there are more than 11 realistic and formidable bosses.
